column1: Bavette's Bar & Boeuf////Not that this place needs another rave review
column2: but WOW.  It's as good as it gets for steak in Chicago.  The atmosphere is so sleek and classy but welcoming at the same time.  I've never had a bad bite of food here.  Every steakhouse I go to
column4: and Bavette's always wins.  I just wish I could afford to come here weekly.
